name: simplicite
description: Simplicite(R) platform Javascript API (for node.js and browser)
author: Simplicite Software <contact@simplicitesoftware.com> (https://www.simplicitesoftware.com/)

scripts.lint: fcli remove test/index.js && eslint src/*.ts src/browser.js test/*.js
scripts.build:cjs: fcli remove ./dist/cjs && fcli copy ./package-cjs.json ./dist/cjs/package.json && tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --esModuleInterop true --outDir ./dist/cjs
scripts.build:bundle: fcli remove ./dist/simplicite.min.js && fcli remove ./dist/simplicite.min.js.map && esbuild src/browser.js --bundle --minify --sourcemap --outfile=./dist/simplicite.min.js
scripts.build:esmbundle: fcli remove ./dist/simplicite.min.mjs && fcli remove ./dist/simplicite.min.mjs.map && esbuild src/simplicite.ts --platform=neutral --bundle --minify --sourcemap --outfile=./dist/simplicite.min.mjs
scripts.build: fcli remove ./dist && npm run lint && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:esmbundle
scripts.doc: fcli remove ./docs && jsdoc -t node_modules/docdash -d docs ./dist/esm/ README.md && replace '#fc83ff' '#98cbff' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#6d426d' '#2e76bd' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#CA79CA' '#edb8b8' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#606' '#094e93' docs/styles/jsdoc.css
scripts.test:all: npm run test:public && npm run test:logins && npm run test:main && npm run test:images && npm run test:source && npm run test:external && npm run test:await
